jobDescription: Data Analyst Level III Annadale NJ area. 1 year contract.Start date 7/2/18 Fortune 500 Oil and Gas Company is seeking a Data Analyst Level III to work with Research and Engineering team. MAIN FUNCTIONS Responsible for importing, cleansing, validating and analyzing data with the purpose of understanding or drawing conclusions from the data. May consolidate and/or present data in charts, graphs, or tables. Focused on improving data quality.  Minimal work direction needed, highly skilled and knowledgeable to the position.  This position would typically include a professional Data Analyst.  Expert in the field, possibly professional certification holder. SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS Strong analytical, verbal and written communication skills.  Report generation and data analysis.  Proficient in MS Office.  Experis is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE/AA)
